attributes.action: Lower the Drink Driving limit to Zero
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is much debate about drink driving levels, etc. and how much a person can and cannot consume.

Let's make things simple, if you drink with ANY alcohol in your system, you are guilty of drink driving.

By lowering the limit to zero, it will make things far simpler for people who drink. If you have had a drink you cannot drive. Doing away with any need to internal debate.
